verses.verse: מִ֤י <S%H4310><s%> O יִתֶּנְךָ֙ <S%H5414><s%> O that כְּאָ֣ח <S%H251><s%> thou [wert] as my brother לִ֔י יוֹנֵ֖ק <S%H3243><s%> that sucked שְׁדֵ֣י <S%H7699><s%> the breasts אִמִּ֑י <S%H517><s%> of my mother אֶֽמְצָאֲךָ֤ <S%H4672><s%> [when] I should find בַחוּץ֙ <S%H2351><s%> thee without אֶשָּׁ֣קְךָ֔ <S%H5401><s%> I would kiss גַּ֖ם <S%H1571><s%> either לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> No יָב֥וּזוּ <S%H936><s%> thee yea I should not be despised לִֽי׃

אֶנְהָֽגֲךָ֗ <S%H5090><s%> I would lead אֲבִֽיאֲךָ֛ <S%H935><s%> thee [and] bring אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> into בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> house אִמִּ֖י <S%H517><s%> thee into my mother's תְּלַמְּדֵ֑נִי <S%H3925><s%> [who] would instruct אַשְׁקְךָ֙ <S%H8248><s%> me I would cause thee to drink מִיַּ֣יִן <S%H3196><s%> wine הָרֶ֔קַח <S%H7544><s%> of spiced מֵעֲסִ֖יס <S%H6071><s%> of the juice רִמֹּנִֽי׃ <S%H7416><s%> of my pomegranate

שְׂמֹאלוֹ֙ <S%H8040><s%> His left hand תַּ֣חַת <S%H8478><s%> be under רֹאשִׁ֔י <S%H7218><s%> [should be] under my head וִֽימִינ֖וֹ <S%H3225><s%> and his right hand תְּחַבְּקֵֽנִי׃ <S%H2263><s%> should embrace

הִשְׁבַּ֥עְתִּי <S%H7650><s%> I charge אֶתְכֶ֖ם <S%H853><s%> בְּנ֣וֹת <S%H1323><s%> you O daughters יְרוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> of Jerusalem מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> not תָּעִ֧ירוּ ׀ <S%H5782><s%> that ye stir not up וּֽמַה־ <S%H4100><s%> or תְּעֹֽרְר֛וּ <S%H5782><s%> nor awake אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאַהֲבָ֖ה <S%H160><s%> [my] love עַ֥ד <S%H5704><s%> Until שֶׁתֶּחְפָּֽץ׃ <S%H2654><s%> until he please ס

מִ֣י <S%H4310><s%> Who זֹ֗את <S%H2063><s%> likewise עֹלָה֙ <S%H5927><s%> Who [is] this that cometh up מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַמִּדְבָּ֔ר <S%H4057><s%> from the wilderness מִתְרַפֶּ֖קֶת <S%H7514><s%> leaning עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and דּוֹדָ֑הּ <S%H1730><s%> beloved תַּ֤חַת <S%H8478><s%> Thahash הַתַּפּ֙וּחַ֙ <S%H8598><s%> thee up under the apple tree עֽוֹרַרְתִּ֔יךָ <S%H5782><s%> awakened שָׁ֚מָּה <S%H8033><s%> There חִבְּלַ֣תְךָ <S%H2254><s%> brought thee forth אִמֶּ֔ךָ <S%H517><s%> there thy mother שָׁ֖מָּה <S%H8033><s%> There חִבְּלָ֥ה <S%H2254><s%> there she brought thee forth יְלָדַֽתְךָ׃ <S%H3205><s%> [that] bare

שִׂימֵ֨נִי <S%H7760><s%> Set כַֽחוֹתָ֜ם <S%H2368><s%> me as a seal עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over לִבֶּ֗ךָ <S%H3820><s%> upon thine heart כַּֽחוֹתָם֙ <S%H2368><s%> as a seal עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over זְרוֹעֶ֔ךָ <S%H2220><s%> upon thine arm כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> is as עַזָּ֤ה <S%H5794><s%> [is] strong כַמָּ֙וֶת֙ <S%H4194><s%> as death אַהֲבָ֔ה <S%H160><s%> for love קָשָׁ֥ה <S%H7186><s%> [is] cruel כִשְׁא֖וֹל <S%H7585><s%> as the grave קִנְאָ֑ה <S%H7068><s%> jealousy רְשָׁפֶ֕יהָ <S%H7565><s%> the coals רִשְׁפֵּ֕י <S%H7565><s%> thereof [are] coals אֵ֖שׁ <S%H784><s%> of fire שַׁלְהֶ֥בֶתְיָֽה׃ <S%H7957><s%> [which hath a] most vehement flame

מַ֣יִם <S%H4325><s%> waters רַבִּ֗ים <S%H7227><s%> Many לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> Nor יֽוּכְלוּ֙ <S%H3201><s%> cannot לְכַבּ֣וֹת <S%H3518><s%> quench אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָֽאַהֲבָ֔ה <S%H160><s%> love וּנְהָר֖וֹת <S%H5104><s%> neither can the floods לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> Nor יִשְׁטְפ֑וּהָ <S%H7857><s%> drown אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If יִתֵּ֨ן <S%H5414><s%> would give אִ֜ישׁ <S%H376><s%> it if [a] man אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all ה֤וֹן <S%H1952><s%> all the substance בֵּיתוֹ֙ <S%H1004><s%> of his house בָּאַהֲבָ֔ה <S%H160><s%> for love בּ֖וֹז <S%H936><s%> it would utterly יָב֥וּזוּ <S%H936><s%> be contemned לֽוֹ׃ ס

אָח֥וֹת <S%H269><s%> sister לָ֙נוּ֙ קְטַנָּ֔ה <S%H6996><s%> We have a little וְשָׁדַ֖יִם <S%H7699><s%> and she hath no breasts אֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> has לָ֑הּ מַֽה־ <S%H4100><s%> What נַּעֲשֶׂה֙ <S%H6213><s%> what shall we do לַאֲחֹתֵ֔נוּ <S%H269><s%> for our sister בַּיּ֖וֹם <S%H3117><s%> in the day שֶׁיְּדֻבַּר־ <S%H1696><s%> when she shall be spoken for בָּֽהּ׃

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If חוֹמָ֣ה <S%H2346><s%> If she [be] a wall הִ֔יא <S%H1931><s%> We נִבְנֶ֥ה <S%H1129><s%> we will build עָלֶ֖יהָ <S%H5921><s%> on טִ֣ירַת <S%H2918><s%> upon her a palace כָּ֑סֶף <S%H3701><s%> of silver וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> if דֶּ֣לֶת <S%H1817><s%> and if she [be] a door הִ֔יא <S%H1931><s%> We נָצ֥וּר <S%H6696><s%> we will inclose עָלֶ֖יהָ <S%H5921><s%> her with ל֥וּחַ <S%H3871><s%> her with boards אָֽרֶז׃ <S%H730><s%> of cedar

אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> I חוֹמָ֔ה <S%H2346><s%> I [am] a wall וְשָׁדַ֖י <S%H7699><s%> and my breasts כַּמִּגְדָּל֑וֹת <S%H4026><s%> like towers אָ֛ז <S%H227><s%> Then הָיִ֥יתִי <S%H1961><s%> became בְעֵינָ֖יו <S%H5869><s%> then was I in his eyes כְּמוֹצְאֵ֥ת <S%H4672><s%> as one that found שָׁלֽוֹם׃ <S%H7965><s%> favour פ

כֶּ֣רֶם <S%H3754><s%> had a vineyard הָיָ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> had לִשְׁלֹמֹה֙ <S%H8010><s%> Solomon בְּבַ֣עַל הָמ֔וֹן <S%H1174><s%> at Baalhamon נָתַ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> he let out אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַכֶּ֖רֶם <S%H3754><s%> the vineyard לַנֹּטְרִ֑ים <S%H5201><s%> unto keepers אִ֛ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every one יָבִ֥א <S%H935><s%> thereof was to bring בְּפִרְי֖וֹ <S%H6529><s%> for the fruit אֶ֥לֶף <S%H505><s%> a thousand כָּֽסֶף׃ <S%H3701><s%> [pieces] of silver

הַיּוֹשֶׁ֣בֶת <S%H3427><s%> Thou that dwellest בַּגַּנִּ֗ים <S%H1588><s%> in the gardens חֲבֵרִ֛ים <S%H2270><s%> the companions מַקְשִׁיבִ֥ים <S%H7181><s%> hearken לְקוֹלֵ֖ךְ <S%H6963><s%> to thy voice הַשְׁמִיעִֽינִי׃ <S%H8085><s%> cause me to hear
